text.section: Employment that an inmate of a custodial or penal institution performs for a not-for-profit organization or a governmental entity is not covered employment.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, employment that an inmate of a custodial or penal institution performs for a private, for-profit employer is not covered employment.

Employment that an inmate of a custodial or penal institution performs for a private, for-profit employer is covered employment if the inmate continues to be employed by the private, for-profit employing unit after being permanently released from the custodial or penal institution, including released by parole.
